alert.note: Alert for Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 26 at 12:15PM MST until February 26 at 9:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Pueblo county. * WHEN...Until 9 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL INFORMATION...One or two thunderstorms may also occur today over the southeast plains, mainly south and east of Pueblo. Any thunderstorm which does develop will have the potential to enhance the strong winds which are already in place, and wind gust to over 70 mph will be possible in and near any thunderstorm activity.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
